title: ISic002922. Epitaph for Laurentius, a doctor, and his wife Prosdocia
body:
1 + Memoria Laurenti
2medici et ussor eius
3 Prosdocia

l.2 reg., orig. ussor

1+MEMORIALAURENTI
2MEDICIETUSSOREIUS
3PROSDOCIA

l.2 reg., orig. ussor

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Korhonen 2010

English translation

Jonathan Prag

In memory of Laurentius the doctor and his wife Prosocia
